TopicTitle: Mod for making prograde vector visible outside of map view

Articles.Content:
I remember seeing a video of Scott Manley using a mod while flying that allowed him to see the prograde vector and heading when not in map view. Unfortunately I have been unable to find this video again, and I cannot remember the name of the specific mod I wanted.

There were two mods:

- One that showed all vectors (prograde, retrograde, normal, radial, etc) in addition to the axi of these

- One that only showed prograde, your heading, in addition to an artificial horizont.

I would like to try both of them, so does anyone know which mods I'm talking about?
